Sentencas: In internally manifolded fuel-cell stacks, there is a non-uniform gas flow distribution along the height of the system.
Titulo: Distribution of gas flow in internally manifolded solid oxide fuel-cell stacks

Sentencas: To gain an insight into this distribution an analytical model has been developed.
Titulo: Distribution of gas flow in internally manifolded solid oxide fuel-cell stacks

Sentencas: In the model, the stack is viewed as a network of hydraulic resistances.
Titulo: Distribution of gas flow in internally manifolded solid oxide fuel-cell stacks

Sentencas: Some of these resistances are constant, while some depend upon the gas velocity and can be determined from the literature.
Titulo: Distribution of gas flow in internally manifolded solid oxide fuel-cell stacks

Sentencas: The model consists of equations for the network with counter-current flow in the manifold channels.
Titulo: Distribution of gas flow in internally manifolded solid oxide fuel-cell stacks

Sentencas: Only the most important resistances are included, i.e., the resistances due to splitting and combining the flows in the manifold channels, and the resistance in the gas channels of the active cell area.
Titulo: Distribution of gas flow in internally manifolded solid oxide fuel-cell stacks

Sentencas: The ratio between the average flow and the flow in the upper cell can be solved from the model.
Titulo: Distribution of gas flow in internally manifolded solid oxide fuel-cell stacks

Sentencas: In this manner, a very useful tool for separator-plate design is obtained.
Titulo: Distribution of gas flow in internally manifolded solid oxide fuel-cell stacks
